results.contributor: by various
results.title: BATMAN: NO MAN'S LAND, VOL. 2
results.author: various
results.description: After a series of dire events, Gotham City is declared a Federal No Man's Land, but Batman, his allies, his enemies and some Gothamites refuse to move.

results.contributor: by Lee Bermejo
results.title: BATMAN: NOEL
results.author: Lee Bermejo
results.description: The Dark Knight lives through his own version of "A Christmas Carol."

results.contributor: by Neal Adams
results.title: BATMAN: ODYSSEY
results.author: Neal Adams
results.description: Mr. Adams, who redefined the look of Batman in the 1970s, returns to the character in this collection.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and Tony Daniel
results.title: BATMAN: R. I. P.
results.author: Grant Morrison and Tony Daniel
results.description: Thomas Wayne, the father of the caped crusader, is cast in a sinister light.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and Tony Daniel
results.title: Batman: R.I.P.
results.author: Grant Morrison and Tony Daniel
results.description: Thomas Wayne, the father of the caped crusader, is cast in a sinister light.

results.contributor: by Judd Winick and Jeremy Haun
results.title: BATMAN: RED HOOD - THE LOST DAYS
results.author: Judd Winick and Jeremy Haun
results.description: The story of the rebirth of Jason Todd, the second Robin who was murdered by the Joker, is told here. As the writer put it, Batman's "greatest failure has come back to haunt him in the flesh."

results.contributor: by Paul Dini and Dustin Nguyen
results.title: BATMAN: STREETS OF GOTHAM, VOL. 3
results.author: Paul Dini and Dustin Nguyen
results.description: Tommy Elliot, the villain known as Hush, plans to murder Batman’s closest allies.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and others
results.title: BATMAN: THE BLACK GLOVE, DELUXE EDITION
results.author: Grant Morrison and others
results.description: In this epic tale, Batman discovers he has a son, who becomes the latest Robin.

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Jock
results.title: BATMAN: THE BLACK MIRROR
results.author: Scott Snyder and Jock
results.description: It is a bad week to be in Gotham City: Batman (Dick Grayson) confronts a new evil and Commissioner Gordon must cope with his psychopathic son.

results.contributor: by Fabian Nicieza and Kevin Maguire
results.title: BATMAN: THE CAT AND THE BAT
results.author: Fabian Nicieza and Kevin Maguire
results.description: One of Commissioner Gordon’s notebooks is stolen. Who will get it first? Batgirl or Catwoman?

results.contributor: by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.title: BATMAN: THE COURT OF OWLS
results.author: Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo
results.description: The caped crusader faces a new conspiracy of evil that goes back to his roots and the earliest days of Gotham City.

results.contributor: by Frank Miller
results.title: BATMAN: THE DARK KNIGHT RETURNS
results.author: Frank Miller
results.description: Another classic from 1986: The caped crusader comes out of retirement to save Gotham City from a depraved street gang that are more monsters than man.

results.contributor: by David Finch
results.title: BATMAN: THE DARK KNIGHT, VOL. 1
results.author: David Finch
results.description: The writer/artist weaves a tale about the murder of a childhood friend of Bruce Wayne.

results.contributor: by Greg Hurwitz and David Finch
results.title: BATMAN: THE DARK KNIGHT, VOL. 2
results.author: Greg Hurwitz and David Finch
results.description: The Scarecrow returns to Gotham City and is deadlier than ever.

results.contributor: by Gregg Hurwitz and David Finch
results.title: BATMAN: THE DARK KNIGHT, VOL. 2
results.author: Gregg Hurwitz and David Finch
results.description: The Scarecrow returns to Gotham City and is deadlier than ever.

results.contributor: by Alan Moore and Brian Bolland
results.title: BATMAN: THE KILLING JOKE
results.author: Alan Moore and Brian Bolland
results.description: This critically acclaimed story from 1988 offers a possible origin for the Joker.

results.contributor: by Jeph Loeb and Tim Sale
results.title: BATMAN: THE LONG HALLOWEEN
results.author: Jeph Loeb and Tim Sale
results.description: This compelling mystery, set early in the Caped Crusader’s career, has mobsters, the sad downfall of Harvey Dent (Two Face) and a new foe: Holiday.

results.contributor: by Jeph Loeb and Tim Sale
results.title: BATMAN: THE LONG HALLOWEEN
results.author: Jeph Loeb and Tim Sale
results.description: This compelling mystery, set in the early days of the Dark Knight’s career, involves the search for Holiday, a serial killer who murders on special days of each month.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and various
results.title: BATMAN: THE RETURN OF BRUCE WAYNE
results.author: Grant Morrison and various
results.description: The caped crusader, lost in times past, makes his return to Gotham City.

results.contributor: by Grant Morrison and others
results.title: BATMAN: THE RETURN OF BRUCE WAYNE
results.author: Grant Morrison and others
results.description: The caped crusader, lost in times past, makes his return to Gotham City.
